content: --प्रस्थं <ab>N.</ab> of a city on the Yamunā, the residence of the Pāṇḍavas (identified with the modern Delhi); इंद्रप्रस्थगमस्तावत्कारि मा संतु चेदयः <ls>Śi. 2. 63.</ls>
इंद्रप्रस्थ (also called हरिप्रस्थ, शक्रप्रस्थ &c.) identified with the modern Delhi, though it stood on the left bank of the Yamunā, while Delhi stands on the right.
